title: Female font
content:
Does anyone know what font this is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [newfemale.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821070019/http:/typophile.com/files/newfemale.jpg) | 3.63 KB |
author: karenhuang

comments.content: I think it's [ITC Caslon no 224 Std, Black Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821070019/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/itc_caslon_no_224_std_black_italic/?sample_text=female&sample_size=74).

I think this may be [Caslon 224 Black Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821070019/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/itc_caslon_no_224_std_black_italic/?sample_text=female).

- Mike Yanega

Ooops! I guess we agree on that.

- Mike Yanega
Thanks so much! It's not in my edition of font book. I think I'd never have found it without typophile!
